title: 3 Year Old Boy Fatally Shot by Step Father
content:
We are following developing news out of Bellevue near Wichita Falls.
Detectives say a toddler was shot and killed because he jumped on a bed. Deputies arrested 18 year old George Wayman. Wayman was three year old Dominic Castro's stepfather.
Investigators say Wayman fired a nine-millimeter handgun at the boy's head. He faces a charge of capital murder. The 18 year old is being held in lieu of a half million dollars bond.
